name: Otter.ai
description: Otter.ai transcribes meetings in real-time, generates summaries, and captures action items automatically.
about: Otter.ai is an AI-powered meeting assistant that joins your video calls, takes notes, and generates summaries automatically. It transcribes conversations in real-time with high accuracy, identifies speakers, and lets you search through past meetings instantly. Integrates with Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.
